entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Thursday 30 March 2023
